<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Basic Arcana](/Feats.aspx?ID=5108) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 223 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetypes** [Wizard](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=218), [Spellshot](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=122) (Level 4)

**Prerequisites**
[Wizard Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=5106)

</column>

---

You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level [wizard feat](/Feats.aspx?Traits=166) of your choice.

<title level="2">Basic Arcana leads to...</title>
[Advanced Arcana](/Feats.aspx?ID=5110)
name: Basic Arcana
